body_html:
@drpngx were you suggesting me to use the dataset API to create a synchronization barrier? I am not sure if that helps with the problems I found as I mentioned in the post above.

And FYI I had no problem enqueuing/dequeuing training data to/from a RandomShuffleQueue. As to whether it is ok to use FIFOQueue to create sync barrier, I am not sure since there's the server connection problems hindering the analysis.
body_text:
@drpngx were you suggesting me to use the dataset API to create a synchronization barrier? I am not sure if that helps with the problems I found as I mentioned in the post above.
And FYI I had no problem enqueuing/dequeuing training data to/from a RandomShuffleQueue. As to whether it is ok to use FIFOQueue to create sync barrier, I am not sure since there's the server connection problems hindering the analysis.
body:
@drpngx were you suggesting me to use the dataset API to create a synchronization barrier? I am not sure if that helps with the problems I found as I mentioned in the post above.

And FYI I had no problem enqueuing/dequeuing training data to/from a RandomShuffleQueue. As to whether it is ok to use FIFOQueue to create sync barrier, I am not sure since there's the server connection problems hindering the analysis.
